title: Modern, sunny 1 bed condo, heat/hot water included. Photos
posting_body: Modern, sunny 1 bed condo, heat/hot water included.
Walk to Harvard and Central Squares.
Wood floors, laundry facilities and central air.
Available for 9/1, no pets or smoking.
Good credit and monthly income needed approx.
There is a real estate fee of $2,450.
Leave me your email address for photos.
Please reference: 1 bed condo Harvard/Central $2,450 in your text or message Thank you
